metadata.title: CVE-2020-35239 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability exists in CakePHP versions 4.0.x through 4.1.3. TheCsrfProtectionMiddleware component allows method override parameters tobypass CSRF checks by changing the HTTP request method to an arbitrarystring that is not in the list of request methods that CakePHP checks.Additionally, the route middleware does not verify that this overridenmethod (which can be an arbitrary string) is actually an HTTP method.

criterions.comment: cakephp package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
